TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlInfoMessageEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage> event contains a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection> collection which contains the warnings sent from the server.
An <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage> event is generated when a SQL Server message with a severity level of 10 or less occurs.

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of warnings sent from the server.
Docs.value: The collection of warnings sent from the server.
Docs.returns: The collection of warnings sent from the server.

Docs.summary: Gets the full text of the error sent from the database.
Docs.value: The full text of the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is a wrapper for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError.Message%2A> property of the first <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> collection.

Docs.returns: The full text of the error.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the object that generated the error.
Docs.value: The name of the object that generated the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is a wrapper for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError.Source%2A> property of the first <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> collection.

Docs.returns: The name of the object that generated the error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves a string representation of the event.
